document_data.name: ''Unholy''
document_data.mainbody: '''Unholy''' weapons were those imbued or otherwise [[item enchantment|enchanted]] with [[evil]] power that was especially harmful when wielded against [[good|morally-upstanding]] foes.
document_data.Powers: Unholy weapons inflicted more grievous wounds whenever they struck a [[good]]-aligned creature or being. Similarly, any godly person that attempted to pick up an unholy weapon themselves were severely weakened until they let it go.
document_data.Notable ''Unholy'' Weapons: * [[Skull blade]]s, enchanted longswords wielded by members of the [[Cyricist]] faith.<ref name=LoD-p180">
